name: Minotaur's Charge
text: Your charge sends foes reeling away, knocking them to the ground.
prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, powerful charge.
benefit: When you hit an opponent with a charge attack, you might also initiate a bull rush as a free action.
